column4: Please consider that not everybody first language is English.

Yes, but one question mark as opposed to 3 isn't mastery of the English language, as I don't know of any language where that is correct.  The rest of his sentences seem fine, wording is fine, not grammar.
But this isn't english class, I will simply mute/ignore, as he seems not to appreciate me helping him deduce that his iso has the beeps, not simply the DVD player.
much appreciated :) let us focus more on Ubuntu support and a little less on English.
